revised_title: Tide Observation Patterns and Tables for Scientific Study
tldr: This article presents patterns and tables for observing tides, aiming to help scientists measure the precise time of high and low waters during a month and mark the degrees of water rising and falling in equal time intervals. The author also discusses the potential use of these tables for ship navigation and safety. The article also mentions an upcoming tide observation engine proposed by Dr. Christopher Wren that could automate some of these measurements.
